name: NSFetchedResultsControllerDelegate
desc: A delegate protocol that describes the methods that will be called by the associated fetched results controller when the fetch results have changed.

items.name: func controller(NSFetchedResultsController<NSFetchRequestResult>, didChangeContentWith: NSDiffableDataSourceSnapshot)
items.desc: Notifies the receiver about changes to the content in the fetched results controller, by using a diffable data source snapshot.

items.name: func controller(NSFetchedResultsController<NSFetchRequestResult>, didChangeContentWith: CollectionDifference<NSManagedObjectID>)
items.desc: Notifies the receiver about changes to the content in the fetched results controller, by using a collection difference.

items.name: func controllerWillChangeContent(NSFetchedResultsController<NSFetchRequestResult>)
items.desc: Notifies the receiver that the fetched results controller is about to start processing of one or more changes due to an add, remove, move, or update.

items.name: func controller(NSFetchedResultsController<NSFetchRequestResult>, didChange: Any, at: IndexPath?, for: NSFetchedResultsChangeType, newIndexPath: IndexPath?)
items.desc: Notifies the receiver that a fetched object has been changed due to an add, remove, move, or update.

items.name: func controller(NSFetchedResultsController<NSFetchRequestResult>, didChange: NSFetchedResultsSectionInfo, atSectionIndex: Int, for: NSFetchedResultsChangeType)
items.desc: Notifies the receiver of the addition or removal of a section.

items.name: func controllerDidChangeContent(NSFetchedResultsController<NSFetchRequestResult>)
items.desc: Notifies the receiver that the fetched results controller has completed processing of one or more changes due to an add, remove, move, or update.

items.name: func controller(NSFetchedResultsController<NSFetchRequestResult>, sectionIndexTitleForSectionName: String) -> String?
items.desc: Returns the name for a given section.

items.name: enum NSFetchedResultsChangeType
items.desc: Constants that specify the possible types of changes that are reported.
